Spoko gierka. Mozna poznac ciekawych Iudzi i prowadzic z nimi konwersacje na powazne tematy jak i  na temat anime.
Mozna tez poznac wspaniaIe dziewczynki które nie patrza na Ciebie jak na  smutnego i bezwartosciowego inceIa; a sa wyrozumiaIe i akceptuja Cie takiego, jaki jestes. Jak ktos potrzebuje interakcji ze wspaniaIymi dziewczynkami; to poIecam te gre.

Just a mentally ill game. Here is why

1. Full premade lobby with LE/LEM with 1.5k+ hours high trust factor and good profiles we match with 5 new accs with 150 hours (MAX) and level 2 max on steam with cheats. Explain how is that possible?

2. You win 20 games literally 16:14 grinding you rankup after 20 games you lose 2 you rank down. Retarded but okay

3. Blatant cheaters shooting through walls not banned ranks LE/LEM/SMFC not even through overwatch. And yes btw FACEIT (Third-Party app) which is not associated with Valve has better Anti-Cheat than Valve (Yes thats true) while Valve updates chicken models not helping and updating their shitty anti cheat.

4. Low trust factor teammates: Ofc this comes with low trust factor teammates (even if I am high trust factor) I get people that troll etc...

5. In total please dont buy this game if u want to stay sane and normal. Please Valve fix this game so you have more people playing and more satisfied old school players. Or just update chickens I guess
